summary: A series of follower overhauls based on my interpretations of their character and making them naturally beautiful. THIS MAKES NJADA A BOSMER, BTW.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21576][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/NJADAEYES.jpg[/img][/url] [/center]



Big change, huh?
[size=4]THIS FACEMORPH MAKES NJADA A BOSMER.[/size]
One thing that Skyrim lacked was a race diversity of followers so that they match into their lore as a country full of Nords. However it was sad to see only Faendal as your only Bosmer follower. >:C And he died early on for me. Personally I think that this fits Njada’s character better, but if anyone wants I can try to make a new follower for her after all of my female facemorphing is over.
Also from what I can tell her race change [b]DOES NOT[/b] alter her stats. However, I play with UFO so if anything changes, please tell me.
And yup, she is blind. But I realized how that can give a striking similarity to 83Willow’s [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16000]Jenassa[/url] so I’ve added a brown-eyed version as well. ? *found that the one-eyed blind version was ucky*
As always, enjoy. Post comments, critiques, and images if you like.



[b]Installation[/b]
Use NMM or extract the files into the skyrim root folder manually. Make sure that the .esp is below mods that affect followers such as UFO!

[b]Uninstallation[/b]
Use NMM or delete all of the files manually. If you are doing it manually makes sure to take out the .TARGA, .dds, and the .NIF files with the number [size=3]0001A6D9[/size] located at
skyrim/Data/textures/actors/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Skyrim.esm and
skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Skyrim.esm

[size=4]Mods Used (none of them required)[/size] list corrected by [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2070732] fileosoft[/url] (BIG thank you to [s]her[/s]HIM!)
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869] *Covereyes look 4[/url] (for the eyelashes)
[*][url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249]*Improved Eyes Skyrim[/url] (for the actual eye texture) 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16147]*Improved Freckles Skyrim[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimonized Unp [/url],
 [*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]*Navetsea\'s Skin and Face Retextures[/url] (also downloaded the optional file for fuller lips and more character or 1.8 patch with toned arms abs is another recommended option),
 [*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333] Navetsea’s Straighter Hair Retexture[/url],
 [*] *[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3574] Gizmodian Scars [/url], 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=140] Amazing Smooth Females Z- Faces[/url].[/list]

Armor set I used in screenshots
[list]
[*] Vanilla Studded Armor
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8361]Dragonbone Necklace[/url] from Expanded Jewlery Crafting.
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130]Silver Creolas from HN66 Earrings.[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15279] Fur cloak[/url] from Scamps Iron Set
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16963] Bracelets[/url] from Leah\'s Armor Set
[*] And though they are never seen, I used Warchief Stompers as well. [/list]

The ENB used is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17672] Pineapplevision[/url]. Favorite ENB so far and I recommend to give it a try.

[b]Known Issues[/b]: There is a slight problem with the lighting. Thanks to fileosoft for explaining it to me. To make things look better  first download the[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5737] \"Calientes texture Blender\"[/url] . And then download the config file [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16263]here[/url]( for people using bella or coverwomen mod try [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15921[/url] this [/url])

Hope it works!

[size=5] WHO’S NEXT? [/size]
Illia is already out!I’m starting to make Uthgerd and Borgakh.

[center][size=7]MY OTHER FACEMORPHS[/size][/center] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17916][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/AELAICON-2.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19125][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/ARANEAICON.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19587 ][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/borgakhicon.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18449][IMG]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/BRELYNAICON-1.jpg[/IMG][/url][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20491][IMG] http://i.imgur.com/XSoco.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19344 ][img] http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/ILLIAICON.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20517/ ][img]http://i.imgur.com/9VQEc.jpg[/img][/url]   [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18043][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/LYDIAICON-2.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17960][IMG]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/MARCURIOICON-2.jpg[/IMG][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18459][IMG]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/MJOLLICON-1.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19252][IMG]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/RIAICON.jpg[/img][/url]
